website_summaries.verdict: A lower profile boot with elastic gusset, reminiscent of 1960s mod boots.
pros: The welted sole gives it a sleeker, less chunky look while still being lightly cushioned
Options for matte or polished finish
Sewn to prevent the upper from separating from the sole
Easy to slip on and off
cons: The leather tends to be stiff at first, so needs some breaking in

customer_reviews.title: Big difference in sizes
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the boots but unfortunately I'm not able to get a size that fits me properly. I usually wear a size 9 but the size 9 is huge on me so I ordered the size 8 and those are so much smaller. I just wish they made half sizes because this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: pauxcide

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots but concerned they are fakes.
customer_reviews.text: I love Dr. Martens. But these boots came in an unmarked cardboard box with no logo or trademark Dr. Martens branding on it. There was no quality control sticker on the inside of my boots, either. I am hesitant to keep them because I believe they are fakes. I will likely end up returning them. Overall it is sketchy that I have received a product not in the original packaging, although it was advertised as a genuine pair of Dr. Martens boots. Lastly, the fabric part on the right shoe is stretched out already, even though I have not even tried it on. Disappointed. Pictures are attached.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: These are the best Chelsea boots I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Chelsea boots I've ever worn. My last pair lasted for about 5+ years and it's still going strong. I've worn it in the snow, rain, and sun and they have held up beautifully. Recently I was looking for a new pair because mine looks too rugged, but I'm still keeping the old ones. They take one day to break in ( make sure you wear thick socks), but once they mold to your feet they are extremely comfortable. I have the same style in every color it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: These were not real Dr Martens.
customer_reviews.text: We discovered immediately that these were counterfeits. There was cardboard taped into the shoe instead of an insole, the insignia was wrong and all the stitching was wrong. This was a bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: J C Foley

customer_reviews.title: So, I guess these fit as expected. They ...
customer_reviews.text: So, I guess these fit as expected. They say they are a US women's 10, I normally wear a 9.5, but these aren't too, too big. It doesn't bother me to have the extra room, it's slight. But it says the European equivalent is a 42. I don't think that's right. I have 3 pairs of Fiorentini + Baker boots and 2 pairs of Birkenstocks and they are all in the European size 40. So, do with that information what you will. I initially ordered what was supposed to be a US women's size 9 bc of all the reviews that said they run big and they were way too small.
customer_reviews.author: SarahATX

customer_reviews.title: Good for thick ankle/calves
customer_reviews.text: As with most Dr. Martins...size down a size. I’m usually a size 7 in other shoes and I ordered these in a 6 and they are perfect! I also have wide feet and wide area between my ankle and calve and these fit beautifully with a little extra room. I’m also 5’1” curvy body and normally boots that hit at the same height dig into my legs...not here!!! I love it! No breaking in was necessary! Love them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Laag

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, but too big.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots and I wish they had fit. I normally wear a size 9.5 with boots and sneakers so I ordered a size 9 with these boots and they were way to big. I have narrow, long feet and my toes still had about a half inch of space before they reached front of the boot. I even tried wearing them with thick socks to see if that would solve the problem. I’m hoping to buy them in a size 8 and see if those work any better.
customer_reviews.author: Gaunkle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a size 7.5, but two friends told me these shoes run large, if at all, so the UK 5/US 7 fit perfectly. Durable and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: ORDER YOUR TRUE SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: I am returning these boots because I ordered, after reading the reviews, a size down. DO NOT do this! I wear most often an 8 and I'm sure an 8 would have fit. I ordered a 7 and it was too small. the boot is super cute, kinda stiff but I'm sure after a few wearings it would begin to break in. I looks more like a rain boot, style and leather wise (shiny) than a traditional doc. I decided not to order in my size only because I have another boot on order, completely different brand, and I'm waiting for them. might order these in my true size another month.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My shoes are definitely authentic. They were comfortable out of the box, which is surprising. I am a size 8 in most all shoes, and I ordered the 8 here. There is a little room in the boot, but a 7 definitely would have been too small. Only complaint is that they squeak SO BADLY on tile or smooth flooring. I've tried to wear them on asphalt/cement a whole bunch, and it's improved the squeak slightly, but it still sounds like wearing rain boots everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish boot
customer_reviews.text: I loved that these are sleek, all black, slim profiled, not chunky boots. However, my usual size 9 is a bit too large, and the 8 is snug. Im keeping the 8 because they are absolutely immaculate and adorable, Ill have to wear a nylon sock with these or they'll hurt my feet. The 9s were so big my heel lifted up and they felt too roomy even with a thick sock. Wish the sizing were better. I have both the black and cherry acadia color. Beautiful shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use a shoe stretcher for wide widths
customer_reviews.text: I have a D-width foot but I couldn't resist these cherry red docs. I wore them a few times hoping I could "wear them in" but the widest part of my foot was killing me at the end of the day. I got a cheap $20 shoe stretcher on amazon and gave these guys a couple of overnights and now they fit like a dream. I love that I can wear them under boot cut slacks for a professional office look or over leggings for something more casual.
customer_reviews.author: clairrr

customer_reviews.title: Faulty boots
customer_reviews.text: I kept hearing wonderful things about Dr. Martens boots and how they last a long time and are really great quality, which made me even more disappointed when after a week of wearing these the inside sole started falling apart and digging into my heels. Ordered a replacement and giving them one more try before actually returning them for good
customer_reviews.author: SMNandi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Runs Big; Stiff leather
customer_reviews.text: Love this Chelsea style and the quality is exceptional. BUT, the leather is really stiff. Not sure how people break this in without cutting off their toe circulation with each step. That stiff. Also, I’m a standard 8 all day long and the size 8 was too big. Probably would have been 7.5 if offered. Then again because of the stiffness of the leather, not sure I would have kept it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: SMASEA65

customer_reviews.title: Not as before.
customer_reviews.text: I had Doc Martens boots in the past and they were great. These were good but they are not as comfortable as my previous pair. These cause pain on both of my feet at the big toe joint. This is easily corrected by wearing gauze, or a foam on that area but I wish I didn’t have to wear that. Hopefully this fixes itself after a while. I got them in February 2020 and we are in May and the issue continues. I am a healthcare worker so I did use them quite often. Not sure if this eventually gets fixed. Not sure I’ll buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best to order a size down for the right fit. I am usually a size 7 women's, and based on the reviews, I ordered a 6. With regular socks, and even slightly thicker winter socks, they are comfortable and fit perfectly. I would not be able to wear really thick socks however. Great shoe, does take a little longer to break in. The sole is not thick the way typical doc martens are, so they do not come across as clunky and do not look like combat boots. Many compliments from people, the ox blood color is classic and can really upscale a casual outfit, really helps to pull it together.
customer_reviews.author: Fashionista

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Most reviews I read said to size up in this boot. I even went in to Nordstrom and tried on my regular size and one size smaller. These definitely run true to size. The heel is a bit wide which gives the feeling of the shoes being slightly too big... but the length and width fit perfectly. Overall these are very nice boots. Look well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: KDL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boot
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They have a lot of character, are very comfortable and retain unique style. I wanted a pit of Chelsea’s for festivals and outdoor events tough enough for fields, comfortable enough for my sensitive back, and stylish enough for me. These work perfectly. The double dye looks like a reddish espresso colour.
customer_reviews.author: FierceMild

customer_reviews.title: A great durable boot
customer_reviews.text: I am not a doc martens enthusiast, in face this is my first pair. The traditional ones are not my aesthetic, but I really like these. They’re a bit bulkier than a fashion boot, but they’re also a lot more durable and comfortable. It takes a bit to make them soften up, they’re hard on your shin at first. But even when they’re still I didn’t get any blisters and spent over 12 hours in them. I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: ToriLovesFreeShipping

customer_reviews.title: More like a rainboot than a leather boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots ran large for me, even with thick winter socks they'd be too big. The polished leather makes the boots look and feel like a shiny rainboot. It wasn't a hit for me unfortunately. They did look like quality boots though, with quality material and construction and I have no doubt they'd hold up to wear if I had kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M.

customer_reviews.title: Someone said in reviews they were that size and got these in 8 US and they were good. I needed this in a 9
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult to determine the size of this boot based on reviews. The original I purchased was a size 8 US. I normally wear 9.5 or 10. Someone said in reviews they were that size and got these in 8 US and they were good. I needed this in a 9. It is in no way the fault of Amazon or the manufacturer, it is just hard to know when you buy shoes on line. Other than that, these are The CUTEST boots. I also bought some for my daughter. Very comfortable. Easy to get on / off. I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Minzi Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this boot!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 9, and occasionally a size 8.5, and purchased an 8 in this boot. It's wide, especially around the ankle, a just a touch tight in length. I agree with other posters that it almost seems like a fake because of the insole esp., which is not in line with the quality of other Doc Martens I have. The boots already look very bulky on my feet, and are too wide, so I'll be returning them, and not ordering a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney C

customer_reviews.title: I like these boots a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots a lot. They run a little large. I ordered exactly my size, but could have ordered a size down. They are somewhat weather resistant, but they are not warm and I wouldn't use them as rain boots. Overall comfort I would rate 7/10. My Achilles tendon is starting to get sore on my right leg, probably from the rigidity of the show. However, it's a good quality boot. I would recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: hnm_614

customer_reviews.title: Way too big, or way too small.
customer_reviews.text: Large, clunky, awful fit. I ordered an 8 (typically wear 8-8.5) and they looked like man boots. So then I ordered a seven and they were literally so small I couldn’t even pull them on. Half sizing would really be beneficial. Returning and ordering Chelsea boot style from another retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Though they come with a all black tag, they are the real deal. I double checked with DocMartens website. Regarding quality I would say they are what you expect from this brand and I have no reason at this point to believe that they would be any different than other DocMartens I owned previously. Regarding size, I usually wear a 6.5 to 7 (european 38) and have medium wide feet. I ordered the 7 and they fit just fine. There is some room at the toes which will come in handy once it is colder and I need warmer socks. Sincerely, happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: True to size after adding an in-sole
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking the sizes were in Men’s, because of the “M” that followed the size number, however the sizes are listed as women’s. I originally ordered a size 5M, which was not too big or too small, just snug. I requested an exchange for a size 7, which was a very simple process. I received the product very quickly. Originally a loose fitting. The boots need insoles, because after a week of using them, my feet started feeling sore. Once insoles are in the boot, they fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Ann Ong

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE FAVORITE BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: As recommended, I ordered ~ a size down. Usually, I'm a 7.5/8. I ordered a UK5/US7 (women's): same as converse. I LOVE THESE BOOTS. I wear them every day. They took some breaking in (for the first few months, I only walked maybe 1.5 miles per day in them). Since then, I've walked up to 10 miles in them with no problems whatsoever. Amazingly comfortable & they look AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfortable - returned
customer_reviews.text: Although they are super cute, I returned them since they were very stiff and the top kind of dug into my toes as I walked (creased down). That might have been alleviated after a long break-in period but I didn't want to take the chance that they'd never really be comfortable enough to wear for lots of walking. They also don't have a lot of cushioning on the bottom and as I was looking for something I could wear all day, this didn't seem to fit the bill for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Lack of half-size is a huge detriment
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered a size 7 - way too big, even with my thick socks. I ordered a size down as recommended (only full sizes exist), and the boot was much too tight in the front of the foot, even though there was toe space. Maybe there is a chance it would stretch out, but not likely and a risk considering the amount spent on the boot. Really beautiful, though.
customer_reviews.author: Galadhel

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable boot. I think it would be easier to get on with a shoe horn, but its not too bad with two hands pulling on each boot. Dr. Marten's tend to be pretty wide, so my foot has enough space. And while there is little arch support, there is more than enough room to put in inserts to add to the arch support. I love the burgundy color.
customer_reviews.author: Orelia E Dann

customer_reviews.title: Finely constructed Doc Martens with a feminine touch!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautifully made and very fine-looking, and a bargain for $70-something. I did take the cushion insoles from a pair of running sneakers and stuck them in these boots, which has made for very comfy walking. The leather is so shiny, so I've been careful to use a waterproofing spray so as to discourage staining. I wear a women's 9-9.5 and bought the size 7 in these, which were perfect even after adding a sneaker insole AND my rigid plastic orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too tight at the ankles
customer_reviews.text: I could hardly get these on and when I did they were stiff as a board. I felt like the circulation was being cut off at my ankles and could not wait to get them off.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Angel

customer_reviews.title: Run Large, should be advised to size down.
customer_reviews.text: In Dr. Marten's Layton boot I am a UK7 (previous boots are also a UK7) so that is what I based my purchase on. These boots run a good size larger than suggested. I will be returning due to sizing.
customer_reviews.author: CClose

customer_reviews.title: 4 UK/6 M US (I wear 7 in American size) RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because they don't have a half size. So I ordered 4 UK/6 M US (I wear 7 in American size). it fits very well even I wear a pair of thick socks. it's very comfortable to wear for a long time. I live near Baltimore so I happen to walk a lot and this shoes does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: TJ & Olivia

customer_reviews.title: No surprises. Fits. Ordered UK 6
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Slight large asI wear a 7 1/2 US. I order Docs in a UK 6 which is a Euro 39 and a US 8. I put arch supports on and wear these and my Noelles in the fall and winter. No regrets. After purchase the item was listed as vegan on the shipping list but genuine leather (as selected) came.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: These were very cute shoes, but a bit wider than I expected, so not as feminine as I was looking for. In addition, they hurt my shins. Perhaps with time, this wouldn't have been such an issue. In the end I decided to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa E.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but they run big
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted a pair of doc martens as I have heard so many great things. I purchased these in a size 8 (my normal size) and they are too big even with thick socks. Wanted to exchange for a size 7 but price went up significantly so I’m going to hold for now. I am returning these but the quality of these shoes is great. I see why this brand gets so many great reviews however definitely do research the sizing. Based on my experience I would say go 1 size down from your norm especially since they are leather and will loosen up even more over time.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Wore them 3 straight days in a row right out of the box without much discomfort. A little bit stiff in the beginning around the ankle area, but overall very comfortable. I added a foot pad for more arch support. They are more "dressy" than the typical Docs, with a thinner sole. Easy to put in and take off.
customer_reviews.author: singsing

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter. She tried them on at the Doc Marten store in Chicago and loved them! Fits the same as her other Docs. She said that they were a lot easier to break in than any of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Peeling insoles
customer_reviews.text: These elegant Chelsea boots are generally good - thanks to the lower price on Amazon, as they are not worth buying in the store. However, just a month after purchase insoles started to peel off, making wearing the boots very uncomfortable. The window to return is closed, so this is my headache now :( Won't buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Yuri S.

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love
customer_reviews.text: 10/10! These are the real deal. I normally wear 9.5 and my feet are a tiny bit wide. I ordered US9/UK7 and they fit perfectly. I’ve been wearing them for 3 days straight I haven’t had any pains from “breaking them in”. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: pattie earl

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit large, great price, a bit stiff
customer_reviews.text: Very similar to the stiffness of other doc marten leather. These are bulkier than they look in the picture in a good, typical doc marten way. Very comfortable. I added a gel insert so they fit more snugly. I went a half size down and you can wear these with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Katie E Gilman

customer_reviews.title: These are VEGAN
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product identified it as “smooth leather” but it turns out that they are actually “vegan.” They are really more like rain boots as it turns out. Too bad. Not a bad looking boot, just not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: old bookie

customer_reviews.title: I would absolutely recommend to size down one size
customer_reviews.text: I would absolutely recommend to size down one size. This is what I did and it fits perfectly. I usually wear a 9.5/10 US and I ordered a 7 UK and I'm satisfied. Also, they look to me like real doc martens. I recommend them. Good quality and beautiful :) Love the color two !
customer_reviews.author: Émilie Bégin-Galarneau

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and used them for guidance for sizing, I wear a ladies 9 and ordered the uk6, they fit great. I also read these shoes were clunky to some, but I can't honestly say these are a stream lined fit.
customer_reviews.author: blanca

customer_reviews.title: Runs large, order half size down
customer_reviews.text: Ill say it’s 1/2 size large than normal shoes. I’m 7/7.5 narrow feet. Ordered US 7 and it runs large. I tried US 6 and it’s too small. I wonder if they have half size so maybe I feel I’m more like a 6.5 for Dr. martens
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Bigger then my 1460s
customer_reviews.text: I was wrong. I was thinking that most people were just not used to the whole sizes from DM. But, NOPE. these were about 1.5 sizes too big. Hopefully the 7s will fit.
customer_reviews.author: deznite

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Boots!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about these boots. The look and the feel is very appealing. I purchased two pair, different colors, for my wife and she loves them both!
customer_reviews.author: RickToye

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot but not for me
customer_reviews.text: The boot is much higher in length than I thought. I wanted more of a bootie-type book. Something just above the ankle. Arch support was minimal. I'd probably need to add a n additional insert for my plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Judybopp

customer_reviews.title: She has been wearing them almost everyday to get them broken in before the trip and she says they are wonderful, with no reserva
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my granddaughter, who is at Georgia Tech, as she and her twin sister are leaving the day after Christmas for a trip to Scotland. She has been wearing them almost everyday to get them broken in before the trip and she says they are wonderful, with no reservations! And they look really good on her even though she is a really small gal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New and Legit
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly in the original box. As far as I can tell these are the real deal and at the very least mine came brand new. I have seen some reviews saying the boots received by some buyers did not appear to be brand new, and to that I would suggest looking at the price you are paying. In saying that, second hand Docs are not necessarily a bad thing, as wearing these shoes in takes time and perhaps a couple blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but completely fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Fit great at first, I wore these shoes almost daily because of how comfortable they are. However, almost immediately after I first bought them they started to become scuffed and creased very noticeably, which is something I'm not used to in Dr. Martens. Now it's been 6 months since buying them and the shoes have a hole in them right where they creased and are falling apart. Really disappointed because it took me so long to find a pair of chelsea boots that were comfortable. I thought Dr. Martens were supposed to be durable, but I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Simonini

customer_reviews.title: Green Color is Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've got these in the Cherry Arcadia and black and love them...the color on the Green Arcadia is stunning, if you keep your feet in direct sunlight in an area with little to no overhead vegetation. The green is a rich, luscious moss...but only in warm golden light. The color is waaay to dark (nope, not even 'subtle' works) and I honestly couldn't differentiate between these and the black in regular indoor lighting.
customer_reviews.author: DashOneCharlie

customer_reviews.title: I love the boots
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots. They are really well made (as always for Dr. Martens) and are aging and breaking in nicely. The size does run a bit big. Nothing that a thick sock won't remedy but certainly something to keep in mind when ordering. I think a size down would be too small so I'm keeping these.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: wanted to love but needed a half size
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style and make of these boots. However, I was between and 8 and a 9 and there was no 8.5 offered. I had to return because the 9 was just too big.
customer_reviews.author: kcmommy03

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: These boots look great with everything. Very stylish, great rich color and well-made. They fit TTS, however, I've always found doc martens to be a little on the "clunky" side. Also like all doc martens they require some breaking in, wear them around for a week or two and you'll be smitten.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: 1 month in — so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy pair of good looking boots. Broke them in within a week of daily wear (thanks New England winter). I’m glad I didn’t size up as suggested in some other reviews. I ordered what I normally wear — a women’s 9 (US), and these were -almost- too big even with a pair of thick wool socks. Very easy to clean and the hint of cherry color is gorgeous. Hoping these shoes will last for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love this boots
customer_reviews.text: It's my first pair of dr martens, size was good as expected. Usually wear 38-38.5 for converse sneakers. 38 for Nike. 39 for high heels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our 21 y.o. daughter's favorite.
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for our daughter for Christmas, at her request. This is what she wanted last year too, and got. I wanted to get her a different Docs style, but she said she just wanted these again. I know these shoes last for years, so now she has a good pair, and a rougher pair. My husband wears Docs also, he has bad feet. They last him for years and he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chelsea boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly made. I've had Dr. Martins before, way back in the day, but these aren't the slightest bit clunky. I fell in love with them the moment I opened the box. Really, they look gorgeous on!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down over the years
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like this show because the quality just isn't there. Dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so perfect. They look great, hold up against rain and snow! However, the first week wearing them, I developed large, inflamed sores from the top part rubbing against my upper ankle. Eventually my skin adjusted and the sores are getting better. In my opinion it was worth it because now they're worn in and look great. So overall I'm very happy! However, I could see how someone might give up on them.
customer_reviews.author: Lanette

customer_reviews.title: Regular Size Worked
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 1/2 US, sometimes an 8, and the 6(UK)8(US) fit me fine with medium weight socks. The heal was a little loose with thin socks. I know I could not go smaller because I ordered a 5(UK)7(US) as well, given all the confusion about sizing in reviews. Those were too tight in the toes. Breaking them in will never solve this problem so I'm returning the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Étaín

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with insoles
customer_reviews.text: These boots were beautiful however they did not come with insoles. The toe box is quite narrow compared to blundstone boots however the ankle is much more loose while my feet slide up and down in the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots were a birthday present for my daughter and she absolutely loved them! As soon as they were unwrapped, she immediately put them on and has worn them every day since!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Jordan

customer_reviews.title: the perfect pair!
customer_reviews.text: FREAKING LOVE!!!!!! Will buy another pair! Comfy, stylish! I love docs! they also fit true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought from outdoor equiped, not fake as negative reviews suggest, they come in original box, with the air war tag. No stamp on the side but I checked several other photos of other flora boot these don't have a stamp. Bought burgundy they are so pretty and yes less clunky than original docs. I am petite and these fit just like other models of docs.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel cheap for the price. I returned them because I couldn’t justify the price for the product. There’s little to no support in the insole, the te box is very narrow, and they look plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very ecstatic about these; I thought they would give me blisters while breaking them in but they are really comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable Shoes - do not buy those
customer_reviews.text: I just bought those shoes and they are extremely uncomfortable - i wish i can return them to Amazon but i do not have the box anymore.
customer_reviews.author: deborah pardo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I purchased the velvet flora and the shoe fit perfectly. This shoe was to big and looked cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality
customer_reviews.text: These boots are giant, bulky, and heavy. Upon arrival they were fraying slightly around the edges and the material is pretty cheap. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: NOT VEGAN
customer_reviews.text: The boots are perfect. My only problem is that I wish I paid attention to the comments before buying, cause THE DESCRIPTION says they're vegan/synthetic, in reality they're leather. And I DID NOT want to buy leather. I guess I'll have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Material is cheap looking. Not well proportioned, and much larger than sized.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I wear them all the time! They were a little loose so I bought insoles. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Pandereta

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide-ish feet, so occasionally finding a boot that still looks sleek is pretty hard. On recommendation of a friend, I picked this boots up and they are really fantastic. They go with everything! On my slightly plus sized frame, they don't look clunky or clownish at all and I am very happy that I chose the Chelsea boot over a more moto-styled one
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Boots
customer_reviews.text: Perfect boots. I've been searching for these boots for about a year.This is my first pair of Doc Martens and this boot made me a believer. The color is dark maroon and they fade to a reddish wine color. They look professional and sleek, not bulky like Doc Martens usually are. They are fairly roomy inside - I bought UK4/US6 and usually wear size 6 wide. Overall great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim Mikhailov

customer_reviews.title: Super shiny
customer_reviews.text: Returned: only because they were too small and WAY too shiny for my style. Love Dr. Marten's!! Will get different size and style.
customer_reviews.author: Finley Wynters

customer_reviews.title: Hoping next pair is better
customer_reviews.text: Super cute boots, great fit, unfortunately the sole started to pull away from boot on the second wear. Returning the boots and because I like them so much, getting a new pair in the hopes that it won’t happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lawless

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Always a great boot but Docs run narrow. Get a set of shoe stretchers with spray shoe stretch and you’ll get a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Xine

customer_reviews.title: I ended up getting my size but after trying them on they felt slightly larger than I hoped for- maybe with thick socks they would’ve been fine. I plan to return them and get one ...
customer_reviews.text: I read mixed reviews before purchasing and couldn’t decide if I should get my size or one size down. I ended up getting my size but after trying them on they felt slightly larger than I hoped for- maybe with thick socks they would’ve been fine. I plan to return them and get one size down, hopefully it will be a better fit. Other than that the shoes came in great condition, sleek, and the perfect shoe to accessorize with just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It’s just cheap feeling leather. Feels more like plastic. Zero insole.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Prust

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: They are very shiny so if you don’t like shine these are not for you. Overall I am happy with my purchase. You can go wrong with the price. I’m questioning if they are leather. I still can’t tell.
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfy from the first wear on
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of boots--stylish and comfy. The fit was exactly as expected and, just as promised, the boots were comfortable with the first wear. I didn't need to break them in or suffer from a painful first time wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Looked like clown shoes. Wore them around the house for about an hour, tried them on with different outfits, but they were just way too big and not cute enough to exchange for a smaller size. Returned the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Loved, but ruined in 7 mo.
customer_reviews.text: I loved loved these boots. Fit perfectly, didn't have to break them in, looked classy. However, I wore them ~5 days a week for 7 months and they've come apart at the seam and there are large holes in both shoes. I would not recommend if you are looking for a daily-wear boot. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Great Vegan Leather Chelsea Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are a little stiff like any pair of Dr. Martens shoes is expected to be, but for the most part they are wearable right out of the box. Great traction, plenty of space in the toe box without feeling like a clown shoe, easy to slip on, and nice looking too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic product
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected. These shoes normally run a bit large so you may need to size down. I am typically a US women’s 5.5 and purchased a UK size 3.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Tang

customer_reviews.title: I spent a long time looking for the perfect Chelsea boot
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time looking for the perfect Chelsea boot. I live in a cold snowy climate so was looking for something that could hold up to the weather without looking too clunky or masculine. These fit the bill! I get compliments almost every time I wear them
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: They are quite easy to break in compared to the 1460 and offer ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit just right and even have a little room so that I can wear thicker socks when the weather is colder. They are quite easy to break in compared to the 1460 and offer the same level of comfort!
customer_reviews.author: PaWhite

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I live in a really cold climate and the traction on these boots were wonderful. Overall really pleased, as usual amazon was cheaper than zappos and the doc martens site.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Look and feel great. You have to break them in a bit but once you do, they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Invisiblehands

customer_reviews.title: Run wide, amazing color, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am a 9.5 women's US and I bought a 10. I am glad I did because I can wear very thick socks with them. The cherry color is divine. Almost looks dark brown but against black you can tell they are not. They are wide and fit my wide feet perfectly. I LOVE THESE!! They will go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size down.
customer_reviews.text: Because I'm a true 8 and in Docs I am definitely a US 7. Just something to think about if you always wear the same size. These are SO comfy and obviously gorgeous and after only like an hour of wearing them they are SO comfortable. EXCELLENT.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Van Meter

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking boots, however they do run a size large. I had to return and reorder in a smaller size. Three stars because the second pair I received was definitely worn. There were creases and scuffs in the leather, and a bigger scuff on the front rubber part of one boot.
customer_reviews.author: Sarcastic_Siren

customer_reviews.title: The size 8 is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I got a size 8 US, I'm normally size 8.5 but can usually fit into 8s. The size 8 is perfect for me, not too big but still has room for thick socks. Boots are comfortable, they pinch a tiny bit on top where it creases but I hardly notice it. I've been walking through snow and over icy sidewalks and while they aren't super grippy they do have decent traction. I've been using the Dr. Martens wonder balsam for protecting the leather. I was eyeing these boots for almost 2 years and I'm super happy with them overall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I was nervous about getting them because everyone said breaking them in was hard, but it wasn't for me! It only took one wear if that. They are the comfiest docs I own. Definitely heavy but still really cute. I am an 8.5 and I ordered the 9, fits a little big but definitely prefer them this way!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Chunky and Squeaky-- but made well
customer_reviews.text: They're a little bit chunkier than I wanted-- as I ordered the Flora. I'm not into the original clown looking shoe, I like my boots a little bit understated. I'm hoping they'll break in soon and become more fitted. I can tell they're made well. The first day I wore them they squeaked up a storm. I'm hoping that wears out too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy wearing them for about 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy wearing them for about 3 hours , after that they start really hurting my foot. There does not seem to be enough of a pad in the front part of the shoe. But I love the style. Probably will not purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kate41

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. They run a little big but not enough for me to size up, so I ordered insoles instead. It seems the boot needed insoles anyway as no cushioning. They are still roomy, but comfy, and appear to be genuine Doc Martens, so hopefully will last for years of use.
customer_reviews.author: laura p

product_meta.title: Dr. Martens Women's Flora Leather Chelsea Boot
feature_bullets: Made with our Arcadia Leather—a classic high-shine rub-off leather with a two-tone effect created with a special treatment to reveal contrast color, particularly in the toe area
Built on the iconic Dr. Martens air-cushioned sole
